results.title: Evidence that metformin exerts its anti-diabetic effects through inhibition of complex 1 of the mitochondrial respiratory chain.
results.text_hl: Evidence that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exerts its anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ effects through inhibition of @<m>DISEASE_Carney_Complex</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056733 @@@complex 1@@@ of the mitochondrial respiratory chain.
